attributes.action: Make college and university government funded
attributes.additional_details: Students in England are going to graduate with average debts of £50,800, after interest rates are raised on student loans to 6.1%, according to the Institute for Fiscal studies. (BBC)
attributes.background: We chose this issue because the number of people falling into debt is astonshing and debt will cripple people's lives.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

We aren't sure how you would like government funding for colleges and universities to change.

You could start a new petition calling for the abolition of university tuition fees and their replacement with direct government funding if that is something you would like to see happen.
